company: Robert Half International, Professional Services – Technology

projects.project_name: Senior Technical Consultant, Frontend Web Development
projects.project_details: Digital, technical, and IT project management consultant and solutions architect within Robert Half Technology’s Salaried Professional Services division. Deployed to organizations on a long-term basis to build consistent processes and provide strategic, futuristic thinking. Training in ReactJS and Angular 2+ via Pluralsight.
Redesign of W. R. Berkley"s Annual Report site, including animations, updated with 2017 stats.
Highlights AllianceBernstein"s efforts in Global Sustainability, giving back to communities, and active participation in equality and representation.

projects.project_name: Inside the Mind of Plan Sponsors
projects.project_details: In 2016, AllianceBernstein defined contribution team conducted a web-based survey of over 1,000 plan sponsors. This site focuses on the trends and problem areas as reported by the sponsors.

projects.project_name: Institutions pages for The Americas, EMEA, and Asia-Pacific
projects.project_details: Overview of investment solutions offered by AllianceBernstein for Alternatives, Equities, Fixed-Income, Multi-Asset and Defined Contribution.

Created a prototype of a financial portfolio application dashboard in jQuery. The application let users search and favorite stock information, manage e-mails, calendars, and meetings. Transitioned the prototype from jQuery to AngularJS.
Developed the site to the motion picture which displayed the trailer and gifs of scenes from the film.

projects.project_name: Share A Praryer: Miracles From Heaven
projects.project_details: An e-card generator, via Canvas, where users selected a message, a background, and entered a recipient. The generated e-card may be downloaded by users or shared via social media.
A social eduction platform for children and teens.
An avatar creator for children and teens to be used for CureHero and Token, a money management app.
A ride sharing Uber-like service, converted to a webapp via Phonegap, and connected to a custom API, RAPID.
A same-day delivery service via bike messengers.
Held weekly one-on-one sessions with students taking the Front-End Web Development course. Walked through assigments, provided feedback, showed alternate solutions and resources based on assignments.
Taught a HTML5/CSS3 course and a jQuery course. Provided insightful feedback on assignments.

projects.project_name: Front-End Web Developement (FEWD) and Web Development Immersive (WDI)
projects.project_details: Expert-in-Residence, assisted in educating students who were interested in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. Held tutoring sessions on-site and online. Provided insightful feedback on assignments.
Developed a virtual library for those who would like to improve their leadership skills.
Created a customizable ticker feed for restaurants via jQuery which displayed news for sports (Sportcast) and local weather (Weathercast).

projects.project_name: Center of Alumni, Parents, and Friends
projects.project_details: Assistant Web Developer for the Center of Alumni, Parents, and Friends at Bentley University. Developed a flip-book for the monthly newsletter, The Bentley Brief. Created monthly reports in Excel for interactions with the newsletter. Managed social media posts for Facebook, Twitter, and Linkedin accounts.
Assistant Web Developer for Web Services at Bentley University. Managed, maintained, and updated HTML and CSS for bentley.edu.
